document_data.mainbody:
he Black Claw was an orc horde assembled by the Brotherhood of the Scarlet Scourge.
In the ,
The horde successfully killed the Waterdeeps leader, Warlord Laroun, before finally being defeated in the Stump Bog by Larouns successor, Raurlor. Their defeat marked the end of Uruth Ukrypt and the Brotherhood of the Scarlet Scourge as major players in the region.
